Author: umsooooyeah
Text: My school also takes boarders (I’m a day girl though) and I feel bad for them because they have to eat breakfast otherwise their technology gets taken away for the whole day and the same applies to lunch and dinner. So please stay strong and remember you don’t have to face consequences(I hope).

Author: JustShitMyPantsOops
Text: I go to a boarding school as well and eat every meal with the same people so I’m surprised they haven’t said anything to me about going to the bathroom after most meals lol. You should let your friend care about you
